channel.title: First rsps... needs help
channel.description:
soooooooooooooooooo,,, heres what ive got
the rune warfare source and client
im using it to practice coding, and i have no idea what im doing
but to start off to help me out, i need help with the following: add these codes: mypos, bank, pickup (item, amount), tele #### ####.
incase u want to know for some reason, i want to add my own models so i need pickup to spawn them, tele to explore for npcs and home bases, my pos cuz idk where i am lol, and bank to bank extra stuff to drop later.
and also where can i find the file to change the exp rate for all stats, and add ::lunar to swap to that spell book?
anyone who can help out, id really appreciate it. thanks (just call me joey instead of oldtorsnewtops)
edit: i also want to add teleport commands like ::home, ::fally, ::varrock, etc. if theres a guide to teleport commands, can u link me to it, or just tell me how to add it? thanks
edit2: how do i make staves like staff of fire, have unlimited fire runes?

item.title: First rsps... needs help
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

This is client help, most of your problems are server sided.

Search for tutorials on how to add your own models.

Read full topic

item.title: First rsps... needs help
item.dc:creator: @oldtorsnewtops oldtorsnewtops
item.description:

soooooooooooooooooo, heres what ive got

the rune warfare source and client

im using it to practice coding, and i have no idea what im doing

but to start off to help me out, i need help with the following:

and also where can i find the file to change the exp rate for all stats, and add ::lunar to swap to that spell book?

thanks
